idea:
Check out our website: Illuminatus Technologies Pvt. Ltd.

Check out our star product, yBuySell: yBuySell.com


WHAT IS YBUYSELL

yBuySell is a peer-to-peer rental platform where you can borrow anything for temporary use and lend everything which is not in use. Save money and earn money with trusted peers for renting or borrowing furniture, electronics, home décor, party items, etc.

We help make products more accessible to you as borrowers can simply borrow items for a fraction of the buying cost while lenders make extra cash from underutilized items they own.

yBuySell helps connect trustworthy lenders and borrowers to facilitate rental of used goods. We help you build trust & take every step to ensure your transaction goes perfectly!

BORROW ANYTHING & SAVE MONEY

Borrow anything from baby cots, prams, baby car seats, laptops, mobile phones, tablet computers, bicycles, bags, luggage, tents, cameras, fitness trackers, sporting equipment etc. You can also post custom requests.

LEND EVERYTHING & EARN CASH

Lenders can now check every user's trust score before sending offers. Earn extra cash by lending any of your belongings that are lying unutilized.

TRUST STRANGERS

Negotiate without exchanging your personal details. Trust score is calculated using a smart algorithm that looks at various factors. Rest assured that we ensure full privacy so that you don't end up getting unnecessary calls from 100s of people. We do not share any of your unnecessary personal details with lenders and borrowers. Only the mobile number and first name are shared with people you confirm the transaction with.

SAFETY OF PRODUCTS

We maintain a complete condition report of every item at the start of a transaction.

QUALITY CHECKS

Every item is quality checked for you at the start of every transaction.

DOOR-TO-DOOR

We take care of the logistics and manage door to door pickups & deliveries (In limited areas for now).
name: ILLUMINATUS TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
AjnaLens (Dimension NXG Pvt Ltd) is the world’s leading developer & manufacturer of Augmented Reality (AR) & Mixed Reality (MR) Smart Glasses company serving Defence, Fortune 100 clients across Asia, Europe and America.


Founded in November 2014, AjnaLens is on a mission of bringing a positive change in society from grassroots leveraging cutting-edge technologies like Mixed Reality, Virtual Reality & Augmented Reality. AjnaLens is the only Indian company manufacturing mixed reality glasses for Defence & Enterprise clients. Many Government organizations like Indian Army, Indian Airforce, Indian Navy, DRDO, Maharashtra Government, and other private players like ATOP food, Khimji Ramdas, PM Experts, and multiple XR companies are their customers.
name: AjnaLens (Dimension NXG)
